title: Vic driver charged over fatal head-on
text:
A man has been charged over the deaths of two "loving grandparents" in a head-on crash in regional Victoria.

The 22-year-old from Melton West has been charged with two counts of culpable driving causing death and is due to appear in Melbourne Magistrates' Court on Monday night.

Farmers Bruce Anderson, 69, and his wife Lyn Anderson, 68, died at Bulla on October 10.

The pair were travelling in an SUV when they collided with a Holden sedan on Sunbury Road.

"We are saddened by the loss of our beloved parents. They were loving grandparents and exceptional people with a zest for life," their family said in a statement on Monday.

"They enjoyed travelling Australia and did many a mile in the outback and beyond. This tragic accident will affect our family forever and we will miss then terribly."
description: A man has been charged over the deaths of two
